code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{createTask}from"../../services/TaskService";import"./AddTask.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTask=_ref=>{let{onTaskAdded}=_ref;const[taskTitle,setTaskTitle]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const task={title:taskTitle,completed:false};createTask(task).then(response=>{console.log("Task added:",response.data);setTaskTitle("");if(onTaskAdded){onTaskAdded(response.data);}}).catch(error=>console.error("There was an error adding the task!",error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-task-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"add-task-header",children:"Add a New Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"add-task-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:taskTitle,onChange:e=>setTaskTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter task title",required:true,className:"add-task-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"add-task-button",children:"Add Task"})]})]});};export default AddTask;
